title: BONUS: 3 Chamber Still Rye: OMG! Plus, Todd Leopold Interview
itunes:title: BONUS: 3 Chamber Still Rye: OMG! Plus, Todd Leopold Interview
description:
The three chamber still was extinct until Todd Leopold and the Leopold Brothers brought it back. Now, it's a still to be reckoned with! Fred tastes the rye from this magnificent still and interview Todd.

The YouTube version: https://youtu.be/foeHvskXuLE

Leopold Brothers video on the Three chamber Still: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0NL2vimfbog&t=526s

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
